module.name: Say My Name
module.description: Allows you to generete a welcome text with googletts that can include name and/or surname of caller if he is in phonebook.
module.changelog: *1.2.5* Add Music Customization *1.2.4* Bug Fix *1.2.3* SayMyName went in America *1.2.2* Fix npm install -g again *1.2.1* Fix npm install -g *1.2.0* New version without dependency
